intro: Psychotria hayatae, commonly known as the Hawaiian psychotria, is a flowering plant native to the Hawaiian Islands. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, green leaves and clusters of small, white to pale pink flowers. It thrives in moist, shaded environments, typically found in the undergrowth of tropical forests. Psychotria hayatae is also noted for its role in the local ecosystem, providing nectar for native pollinators.
